name: receive_the_credit_card_data
description: Fetch credit card data from a simulated API based on the specified card type.

visa_type.description: Type of visa card to generate. Defaults to 'visa'. Valid options include 'amex', 'diners', 'discover', 'jcb', 'jcb15', 'jcb16', 'maestro', 'mastercard', 'visa', 'visa13', 'visa16', 'visa19'.

name: red_colour_qr_code_generator
description: Generates a red-colored QR code for the given URL using the RapidAPI service.

url.description: The URL to encode in the QR code. Defaults to 'grayhat.in'.
